None.Name: Harmstring Rage
None.Description: Unit does increasingly more damage the longer it attacks but falls back to its original damage output if it doesn't fight for 5 seconds. Additionally, attacked units may only move at walk speed for 10 seconds.

Three.Name: Harmstring Rage
Three.Description: Unit does increasingly more damage the longer it attacks but falls back to its original damage output if it doesn't fight for 5 seconds. Additionally, attacked units may only move at walk speed for 10 seconds.

Extra.en: Charge deals 250 damage at every upgrade level. Rage makes sure every fifth attack doubles the attack power of the unit,  up to a maximum cap of quadruple (4x) damage. Giant Slayer's attack pattern is as follows: 1x-1x-1x-1x-2x-2x-2x-2x-4x. After that,  quadruple damage is dealt every attack until it leaves combat for 5s. Rage applies to Charge,  and Charge counts as an attack for Rage.

Giant Slayer's attack pattern is as follows: 1x-1x-1x-1x-2x-2x-2x-2x-4x. After that,  quadruple damage is dealt every attack until it leaves combat for 5s. Rage applies to Charge,  and Charge counts as an attack for Rage.
